job.title: Software Engineer- The Juice
job.description: strongAbout The Juicestrong The Juice is reinventing the B2B Content Marketing landscape putting content consumers front and centerbrbrThe Juice collects consolidates and curates insightful resources from across the internet into a single platform where members can organize share and enjoy content curated for them without ever having to fill out a formbrbrWhile much of the best educational content for professionals is produced by brands the experience of consuming this content has traditionally been terrible with gated content forms followed by the inevitable pummeling of unwanted sales pitches The Juice puts content consumers in control of how and when they engage with brands while augmenting the impact and audience for brands that produce quality contentbrbrstrongAbout this rolestrong The Juice is looking for a motivated Software Engineer You should be an experienced software engineer who enjoys building cutting edge technology from the ground upbrbrAs one of the first members of the engineering team in a fast growing startup this is an opportunity to have your fingerprints on a product and team that is creating a content marketing platform to put an end to antiquated marketing and sales tactics Your efforts will shape the future of the company and your career growth and opportunities will be dramatically accelerated Youll work closely with the product and engineering teams while reporting directly to our CTObrbrThe Juice is based in Indianapolis but open to remote employeesbrbrstrongOur stack brstrongulliRuby 3liliRails 6liliHotwire Stimulus  TurboliliSidekiqliliRedisliliPostgres 13liliHerokubrliulstrongCompensation 70000100000 based on experiencebrbrstrongstronguWhat Youll DobrustrongulliWork as part of a product amp engineering team thats focused on delivering value to both content consumers and our B2B content marketer customersliliWrite readable scalable maintainable and well tested code in Ruby on Rails applications with an expectation to enhance proficiency in Ruby and JavaScriptliliAssist in the definition and scoping of new product featuresliliReview the work of fellow engineers ie code reviewsliliCollaborate on engineering ideas and concepts with product and engineering teamsliliPursue ongoing professional development to develop engineering skillsbrliulstronguWhat Were Looking Forbrustrongulli3 years professional development experienceliliSignificant handson experience in Ruby on Rails with some frontend experienceliliExperience in endtoend product design conceptual discovery through highfidelity delivery but with a strong visual UI focusliliSomeone with strong communication skills to connect with a small earlystage teamliliDesire to listen understand the why behind engineering tasks and push back when something doesnt make senseliliGenuine curiosity and a strong desire to continuously learn and growbrliulstrongWhat We ValuebrbrstrongstrongDREAMING BIGbrbrstrongstrongWe constantly challenge ourselves to push boundaries defy conventional wisdom and take smart risks by pursuing big opportunities hiding in plain sightbrbrstrongstrongMOVING FASTbrbrstrongstrongWe push ourselves and portfolio companies to build processes and systems that compress time speed and decisionmaking to produce results fasterbrbrstrongstrongEXPECTING MOREbrbrstrongstrongWe demand the best from ourselves our team and our partners We create the context for success by providing the appropriate resources infrastructure training and mentorship required to winbrbrstrongstrongHigh Alpha is an equal opportunity employer and we value diversity at our company We dont discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability statusstrong
